chest.name: chest
chest.examine: An iron-bound construct of wooden planks generally containing something useful. Like socks.

corpse.name: corpse
corpse.examine: The remains of the fallen. Worthy foe or trifle, this is all that remains of its legacy.

grave.name: grave
grave.examine: A lonely monument to a questionable series of decisions. It bears a short epitaph, nearly illegible with the passage of time.

goo.name: chest
goo.examine: A shimmering, oily smear, slowly dissipating into the porous ground. Hopefully it will never move again.
